attributes.action: House all ex-servicemen/women that are homeless
attributes.additional_details: this petition is mainly because I think it's absolutely ludicrous that people who have fought for this country risked their life's for US have nothing. They are cold at night. No food. No shelter. Nobody to talk to. Can you imagine how that feels? Let down and betrayed by your own country. Whilst we help complete strangers? It's time we all come together and unite as one as get these British human beings of the streets and into a safe stable way of life again.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107702

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
